title: i logged in to my recently created smurf and the werdest thing happend this morning
body: i made a smurf last week i named after my main (talonsbladexx) and played up to lvl 7 with no champs unlocked, then logged off. i logged in after a week today to discover the account lvl 23, with talon and shaco unlocked as well as a lethality runepage. i didnt touch the account since lvl 7 or share my details, so it came as a wierd but pleasant surprise. if the guy who did it is on here thx for grinding my main and runes and illl leave the password the same since i can change it with email if he screws me, u can keep pubstomping with shaco when im on my main lmao

replies.body: You might have actually logged into the wrong account.  I've seen posts like this a few times, and it's usually that they're logged into someone else's account and their smurf is still there but stuff got mixed up during the name change.

i think i did, as the ingame name of the account is the username for my old one

ohwell ima enjoy the champs and runes tho
or you could not steal someone else's account.  That's another option.
i didnt steal it? i used my crediential and it logged in, so it has to be mine

? I don't see you investigating to find your lvl7 in case it's there.
"it was lvl 7 but now it's level 23... hmmm well it might very well be that I logged into the wrong account due to computer error but ohwell ima enjoy the champs and runes tho"
why would i try to find the lvl 7?

The question is actually why _wouldn't_ you.
Since that's your actual smurf and you're unsure if the 23  is yours.
funny story... i just realized that smurf is my oldest one, that i rage quitted and forgot about but i didnt bother to make a new password for my new one.........lmfao rip
Uh huh.  wouldn't that be _convenient_.  Anyways, good luck on your lvl 7 and if the 23 isn't yours then I have full faith in Riot to protect it until the true owner is confirmed.
oh no im serious, i have access to both now but see no point in using the lvl 7
Eh, I don't advise that. Account sharing is against the rules, and since you know he has access and you're allowing it Riot may very well permaban it.
i do plan to change the password once i get to ranked, and im fairly certain whoever it is wont log in again and if they do they prob wont play
lmao wish someone could do that on my smurf
